qrList.label: 开启GM
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["Emotion","STAY HERE?","Loop Time"] 怎么，想要开后门？ |
/setvar key=command ||
/if left=command rule=eq right=""{: /flushvar command | /abort :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Emotion" {: /flushvar command | /run 嗔痴 :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Loop Time" {: /flushvar command | /run 命运 :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="STAY HERE?" {: /flushvar command | /run 强留 :} ||

qrList.label: 嗔痴
qrList.message:
/input 要改成多少？[0, 100] |
/setvar key=amount {{pipe}} ||
/if left={{getvar::amount}} right="" rule=neq {: /addvar key=amount {{newline}} :}|
/sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.执念值', 0, {{pipe}}); // 手动更改
</UpdateVariable> ||
/flushvar amount ||

qrList.label: 命运
qrList.message:
/input 要改成多少？|
/setvar key=amount {{pipe}} [11, +∞] ||
/if left={{getvar::amount}} right="" rule=neq {: /addvar key=amount {{newline}} :}|
/sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.轮回次数', 0, {{pipe}}); // 手动更改
</UpdateVariable> ||
/flushvar amount ||

qrList.label: 强留
qrList.message:
/input 要改成多少？[0,100] |
/setvar key=amount {{pipe}} ||
/if left={{getvar::amount}} right="" rule=neq {: /addvar key=amount {{newline}} :}|
/sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.留在这个世界的意愿', 0, {{pipe}}); // 手动更改
</UpdateVariable> ||
/flushvar amount ||

qrList.label: 脱出许可
qrList.title: 脱出许可
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["Commit", "Revert"] 是否允许脱出？ |
/setvar key=command ||
/if left=command rule=eq right=""{: /flushvar command | /abort | /send <user>没有作出选择 | /trigger :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Revert" {: /flushvar command | /abort | /sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.脱出许可', 0, 2); // STYX HELIX
</UpdateVariable> | /send <user>在面板中选择了Revert | /trigger :} ||
/if left=command rule=eq right="Commit" {: /flushvar command | /sendas name=程栩渊 <UpdateVariable>
_.set('程栩渊.脱出许可', 0, 1); // そばにいるよ
</UpdateVariable> | /send <user>在面板中选择了Commit | /trigger :} ||
